feed.title: BIP for standard multi-signature P2SH addresses

entry.title: BIP for standard multi-signature P2SH addresses
entry.summary: The email conversation between Gregory Maxwell and Pindar Wong suggests adding a statement to indicate that after copy-editing and acceptance, a BIP (Bitcoin Improvement Proposal) number is assigned and it will be published on the Bitcoin Wiki page. Wong suggests introducing a 'Bitcoin-Draft' status with an auto-expiry period similar to the 'Internet Drafts' concept of IETF. Maxwell explains that posting to the list is already considered a draft document and requires no approval beyond filling out the right form. However, he agrees that calling it a distinct step might be better.
